price: 39. Aujourd’hui, il ne vous servira à rien, alors que vous avez déjà fait preuve d’injustice,  d’être solidaires dans le supplice.
arabic: وَلَن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ إِذ ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَنَّكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِكُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walan yanfaʿakumu al-yawma idh ẓalamtum annakum fī al-ʿadhābi mush'tarikūna
